properties.description: Use this pipeline to connect the the API managed services REST API using thr

activities.name: copy REST API dataset
activities.description: Copies the REST API dataset to datalake.

compositeRequest.url: /services/data/v59.0/query?q=SELECT Id, CaseNumber, Status, isClosed, Loan_Number_Display__c, Date_opened__c, Date_closed__c, NonCollaborativeMode__c, MotivationNoChange__c, Notice__c, (SELECT Id, AnnualIncomeClient1__c, AnnualIncomeClient2__c, AnnualPensionClient1__c, AnnualPensionClient2__c, PaymentPension__c, PaymentEndFiscal__c, PaymentEndLoan__c, IntentionConversion__c, IntentionExtendLoan__c, IntentionInterestRateAveraging__c, IntentionInternalRefinance__c, IntentionMoving__c, IntentionNewRepaymentTypeAnn__c, IntentionNewRepaymentTypeLin__c, IntentionPrepayOnce__c, IntentionOther__c, IntentionPrepayOnceAmount__c, IntentionPrepayPeriodAmount__c, IntentionPrepayPeriodEndDate__c, IntentionPrepayPeriodically__c, IntentionUpdatePropertyValue__c, IntentionVisitAdvisor__c, NoIntentionReason__c, OpenIntentionDescr__c, Follow_up_Date__c, FollowUpAction__c FROM Tasks WHERE RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Active_Servicing') FROM Case WHERE RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Active_Servicing' AND ((isclosed = true) OR (isclosed = false AND Owner.Name != 'Wachtrij Actief Beheer'))
